responsibilities: Practical intermediate LLM prompt engineering
Core competency using LLMs to process large data swaths, create desired outcomes, and shape bot logic
Use Excel and basic analysis tools to evaluate the efficiency of the LLM prompts
Experience improving products and customer experience with A/B testing
Optimize existing conversation flows and build new ones that engage, convert, and support customers
Conduct linguistic and functional quality assurance of chatbots
Work closely with Product Managers to identify new testing opportunities and conversational strategies
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)

The focus seems to be more on using existing models and optimizing prompts rather than training or fine-tuning models for domain-specific tasks.
